tool-data.info: I use different tool to achieve fast and efficient workflow. Diversified involvement in processes gave me experience not only as a developer, but also as a designer. Here are some programs I use frequently for my work

skills.two: ✔️ Active user of Git version control system

prj-web.password-generator: Passwords generator app with adjustable length and type of characters.
prj-web.bank-card: Interactive form for filling in bank card data
prj-web.storage-layout: Adaptive component for a cloud storage site
prj-web.tip-calc: A web application that allows you to calculate the tips by the percent and number of people for input
prj-web.todo-app: A ToDo website with filter for completed and active tasks and a drag&drop function
prj-web.tutor-site: Tutor landing with a form for sign in
